entry.title: Blog Concept
entry.content:
I hope to work on the following kinds of essays, reviews, articles:

  • How Can We Determine What Is and What Is Not Speculative Theology
  • many thoughts on baptism & communion
  • what to call LCF Baptists
  • reviews of key books that have helped me
    • Revival and Revivalism by Iain H. Murray
  • My Burned Over District // a lengthly, multi-chapter essay
  • The Name of God in Moses and John
  • a general response to the “Not So Great Awakening” position
  • history & philosophy of the theological sciences
  • primary, secondary, and tertiary doctrine
  • Dispensationalism, Convenantalism, Speculative Theology
  • Revival, Evangelism, Discipleship, Church Growth, Revivalism
entry.summary: I hope to work on the following kinds of essays, reviews, articles: How Can We Determine What Is and What Is Not Speculative Theology many thoughts on baptism & communion what to call LCF Baptists reviews of key books that have helped me Revival and Revivalism by Iain H.
